excerpts.title: Responsive Mistakes: Less is More
excerpts.body:
This is part 2 of my responsive mistakes mini-series.
Responsive design musing often leans towards a mobile bias. It’s obvious why. After years of desktop-centric design, mobile is brimming with fresh opportunity.
As it turns out, the mobile perspective is very helpful for us and our clients. Designing for small viewports forces content to the forefront of discussion. […]
